    • Method Detail

      • register

        User register(java.lang.String login,
              java.lang.String password,
              java.lang.String role)
       throws java.lang.Exception
        This method allows you to register an user in the database.
        Parameters:
        login - the login for this user
        password - the password for this user
        role - the role for this user. (The role must be `admin` or `customer`)
        Returns:
        the new User with the auto increment id register in the object
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - throw an exception if the user login already exist

      • unregister

        boolean unregister(int id,
                   java.lang.String token)
        This method allows you to unregister an user in the database.
        Parameters:
        id - the id of the user to unregister
        token - the token of an admin user
        Returns:
        true if the unregister is realized

      • getUsers

        java.util.List<User> getUsers(java.lang.String token)
                       throws java.lang.Exception
        This method allows you to get all users in the database.
        Parameters:
        token - the token of an admin user
        Returns:
        the list of users
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - throw an exception if the token is not valid

      • auth

        java.lang.String auth(java.lang.String login,
                      java.lang.String password)
               throws java.lang.Exception
        This method allows you to auth an user and return the token.
        Parameters:
        login - the login of the user to auth
        password - the password of the user to auth
        Returns:
        the token
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - throw an exception if the login or/and password is invalid

      • disconnect

        boolean disconnect(java.lang.String token)
            throws java.lang.Exception
        This method allows you to disconnect an user.
        Parameters:
        token - the token of the user to disconnect
        Returns:
        true if the disconnection is realized, else false
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - throw an exception if the token doesn't exist

      • getUserFromToken

        User getUserFromToken(java.lang.String token)
               throws java.lang.Exception
        This method allows you to get an user from a token.
        Parameters:
        token - the token of the user to retrieve.
        Returns:
        the user
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - throw an exception if the token doesn't exist

      • userIsAdmin

        boolean userIsAdmin(java.lang.String token)
             throws java.lang.Exception
        This method allows you to know if an user is admin.
        Parameters:
        token - the token of the user
        Returns:
        true if the user is an admin
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - throw an exception if the token doesn't exist
